meanings.sent1: The teacher's list was checkmarked to show which students completed their assignments.
meanings.sent2: She proudly displayed her checkmarked test paper on the refrigerator.
meanings.sent3: The checkmarked boxes on the form made her feel accomplished.
meanings.sent4: The checkmarked trail guided them safely through the forest.
meanings.sent5: The checkmarked map helped them navigate the city easily.

meanings.sent1: Please checkmarked the items you have completed on the list.

meanings.sent3: She checkmarked her progress on the chart with colorful markers.
meanings.sent4: The chef checkmarked the ingredients he needed for the recipe.
meanings.sent5: The supervisor checkmarked the completed tasks on the project board.

meanings.sent1: The checkmarked boxes indicated the correct answers.
meanings.sent2: The form with the checkmarked sections was ready to be submitted.
meanings.sent3: His checkmarked ballot was ready to be cast in the election.
